content: crochet crown pattern - crochet prince or princess crown pattern crochet pdf tutorial - crochet tiara - instant download includes instructions for a sweet crown in sizes newborn to adult for play for photoshoots or just for fun ***please note that this pattern is available for free on my blog www crochet365knittoo com the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern *** materials needed - worsted weight yarn exact brand and color provided - crochet hook size g - tapestry needle for weaving in ends pattern is written in english using standard american terms level advanced beginner/intermediate this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2018 crochet 365 knit too do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may however sell finished products due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase
